response.original_title: Oscar Nominated Short Films 2015: Live Action
response.overview: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Live Action category for 2015.  “Aya,” Oded Binnun and Mihal Brezis - 40 min,  “Boogaloo and Graham,” Michael Lennox and Ronan Blaney - 14 min,  “Butter lamp,” Hu Wei and Julien Féret - 15 min,  “Parvaneh,” Talkhon Hamzavi and Stefan Eichenberger - 25 min,  “The Phone Call,” Mat Kirkby and James Lucas - 20 min
response.title: Oscar Nominated Short Films 2015: Live Action
